Colophon

This is a personal website, designed, built, and maintained by me, Zinzy Waleson Geene.

Technical details

A full overview of the technical implementation of this website can be found in my humans.txt file.

Philosophical

This website is a vastly personal project. It contains soft stances, lived experiences, and critical notes on the things I hold dear. I use this website to participate in the IndieWeb. I believe in Thinking in public, and having it be an act of Anti-marketing. This space isnâ€™t allowed to pressure me to be smart, funny, insightful or anything else that I am not on a permanent basis. I donâ€™t pretend to be involved in current events, and because of that you may find me discover things youâ€™ve known about for ages already.

Content

On this website, I mostly share two types of content: dated posts, sorted chronically in a blog, and my working notes, which are updated frequently as I learn and develop my unfinished thoughts. If you spot anything that you think is wrong, let me know.

Design

This website is a text-mostly website, meaning it is designed to focus on the written word. I hope it provides a comfortable reading experience regardless of the screen you have. Thereâ€™s a color theme for light mode, as well as dark mode. Iâ€™m in the process of making my website fully accessible.
